languages.text: В пропитанных кровью снегах было найдено тело Ульфара. Вокруг были следы страшного сражения, а тело Космического волка оказалось покрыто жуткими ранами. Отрядный целитель предположил, что даже Ангел Императора недолго протянет с такими травмами.

Ulfar has been found lying in the blood-soaked snow. There are signs of a terrible battle all around, and the Space Wolf's body is covered in grievous wounds. The expedition healer doubts that even an Angel of the Emperor will last long with such injuries.
languages.original_text: В пропитанных кровью снегах было найдено тело Ульфара. Вокруг были следы страшного сражения, а тело Космического волка оказалось покрыто жуткими ранами. Отрядный целитель предположил, что даже Ангел Императора недолго протянет с такими травмами.

traits.locale_text: Ulfar has been found lying in the blood-soaked snow. There are signs of a terrible battle all around, and the Space Wolf's body is covered in grievous wounds. The expedition healer doubts that even an Angel of the Emperor will last long with such injuries.

Ulfar has been found lying in the blood-soaked snow. There are signs of a terrible battle all around, and the Space Wolf's body is covered in grievous wounds. The expedition healer doubts that even an Angel of the Emperor will last long with such injuries.

Ulfar has been found lying in the blood-soaked snow. There are signs of a terrible battle all around, and the Space Wolf's body is covered in grievous wounds. The expedition healer doubts that even an Angel of the Emperor will last long with such injuries.

Ulfar has been found lying in the blood-soaked snow. There are signs of a terrible battle all around, and the Space Wolf's body is covered in grievous wounds. The expedition healer doubts that even an Angel of the Emperor will last long with such injuries.

languages.text: 士兵们发现，乌尔法躺在被鲜血浸透的雪地里，周围到处都是激烈战斗的痕迹，他的身上遍布着可怕的伤口。探险队的治疗师不抱太大希望——即便是帝皇的天使，在这样的伤势之下，恐怕也撑不了多久。
languages.original_text: Ulfar has been found lying in the blood-soaked snow. There are signs of a terrible battle all around, and the Space Wolf's body is covered in grievous wounds. The expedition healer doubts that even an Angel of the Emperor will last long with such injuries.

traits.locale_text: 士兵们发现，乌尔法躺在被鲜血浸透的雪地里，周围到处都是激烈战斗的痕迹，他的身上遍布着可怕的伤口。探险队的治疗师不抱太大希望——即便是帝皇的天使，在这样的伤势之下，恐怕也撑不了多久。

languages.text: ウルファーは血だらけの雪の中に倒れているところを発見される。そこら中に激しい戦闘の痕跡が見受けられ、このスペースウルフの身体はひどい傷だらけだ。調査部隊の治療師は、皇帝の天使であろうとこんな怪我では長くは持たないのではないかと懐疑的だ。
languages.original_text: Ulfar has been found lying in the blood-soaked snow. There are signs of a terrible battle all around, and the Space Wolf's body is covered in grievous wounds. The expedition healer doubts that even an Angel of the Emperor will last long with such injuries.

traits.locale_text: ウルファーは血だらけの雪の中に倒れているところを発見される。そこら中に激しい戦闘の痕跡が見受けられ、このスペースウルフの身体はひどい傷だらけだ。調査部隊の治療師は、皇帝の天使であろうとこんな怪我では長くは持たないのではないかと懐疑的だ。

languages.text: Ulfar yace en la nieve impregnada de sangre. Lo rodean las secuelas de una cruenta batalla y el cadáver del Lobo Espacial presenta graves heridas. El médico de la expedición duda que incluso un ángel del Emperador aguantara mucho tiempo con semejantes lesiones.
languages.original_text: Ulfar has been found lying in the blood-soaked snow. There are signs of a terrible battle all around, and the Space Wolf's body is covered in grievous wounds. The expedition healer doubts that even an Angel of the Emperor will last long with such injuries.

traits.locale_text: Ulfar yace en la nieve impregnada de sangre. Lo rodean las secuelas de una cruenta batalla y el cadáver del Lobo Espacial presenta graves heridas. El médico de la expedición duda que incluso un ángel del Emperador aguantara mucho tiempo con semejantes lesiones.

languages.text: Ulfar a été retrouvé gisant dans la neige ensanglantée. Les traces alentour et les graves lésions couvrant le corps du Space Wolf témoignent de la violence de sa lutte. D'après les guérisseurs de l'expédition, même un ange de l'Empereur ne pourra survivre bien longtemps à de telles blessures.
languages.original_text: Ulfar has been found lying in the blood-soaked snow. There are signs of a terrible battle all around, and the Space Wolf's body is covered in grievous wounds. The expedition healer doubts that even an Angel of the Emperor will last long with such injuries.

traits.locale_text: Ulfar a été retrouvé gisant dans la neige ensanglantée. Les traces alentour et les graves lésions couvrant le corps du Space Wolf témoignent de la violence de sa lutte. D'après les guérisseurs de l'expédition, même un ange de l'Empereur ne pourra survivre bien longtemps à de telles blessures.

languages.text: Ulfar wird in blutdurchtränktem Schnee gefunden. Überall sind Hinweise auf einen schweren Kampf, und der Körper des Space Wolf ist voller schwerer Wunden. Der Expeditionsheiler bezweifelt, ob selbst ein Engel des Imperators mit solchen Verletzungen lange überleben kann.
languages.original_text: Ulfar has been found lying in the blood-soaked snow. There are signs of a terrible battle all around, and the Space Wolf's body is covered in grievous wounds. The expedition healer doubts that even an Angel of the Emperor will last long with such injuries.

traits.locale_text: Ulfar wird in blutdurchtränktem Schnee gefunden. Überall sind Hinweise auf einen schweren Kampf, und der Körper des Space Wolf ist voller schwerer Wunden. Der Expeditionsheiler bezweifelt, ob selbst ein Engel des Imperators mit solchen Verletzungen lange überleben kann.

languages.text: Ulfar, kanla kaplı karın üzerinde bulunuyor. Etrafında korkunç bir savaşın izleri olan Uzay Kurdu'nın bedeni, acı verici yaralarla kaplı. Keşif şifacısı, İmparator'un Meleği bile olsa bu yaralarla fazla dayanamayacağını söylüyor.
languages.original_text: Ulfar has been found lying in the blood-soaked snow. There are signs of a terrible battle all around, and the Space Wolf's body is covered in grievous wounds. The expedition healer doubts that even an Angel of the Emperor will last long with such injuries.

traits.locale_text: Ulfar, kanla kaplı karın üzerinde bulundu. Etrafında korkunç bir savaşın izleri vardı ve Uzay Kurdu'nın bedeni acı verici yaralarla kaplıydı. Keşif şifacısı, İmparator'un Meleği bile olsa bu yaralarla fazla dayanamayacağını söyledi.
